column8: We Admire Taylor guitars for their humble beginnings and the proof that quality, determination and perseverance works.  !0 years of unprofitable graft  before achieving a world wide reputation requires something special.  That and Wayne Hancock was playing one last night upstairs at the Kings Head, 311 Kilburn High Road, North London.   Quite a night.  There seemed to be some contractual dispute going on between the pedal steel guitarist and Mr Hancock but the result seemed in the best traditions of creative conflict.  The volatility added to proceedings, Mr Hancok's Taylor sounded good all night.  Admire a great guitar, wear our Taylor Guitar t shirt.
